name: Minor Inconvenience
description:
Here, you play as a minor who needs to keep the furnace running by throwing coal in it to keep your job ! But it won't be so easy as the time you have is limited and the plateforms keep appearing !

I did everything myself except for the music (mostly live on twitch) during the jam, I’ve been developping for a few months now and I really hope that you’ll enjoy the game !

Controls :
  • A & D To go left and right
  • Space To jump/double jump/walljump
  • Left Click To interact with the coal

The game is controller friendly (except for the menus)
